text: moo cows by the sea shore

name: Motion Constrained
text: As one of the few companies in the United States that offers authentic Hiwin linear motion products, Motion Constrained specializes in the sale and distribution of a variety of machine parts for automation.
features: Monitor and manage website sales, security, and general activity

name: ConTRAPtions Escape Rooms
text: These guys combine the creative power of an artist and a machanical engineer to bring to life a very exciting and unique escape room experience. It has consistently been rated one of the top escape rooms in northern Colorado and has been featured on several major news outvars.

name: American Partnership For Eosinophilic Disorders
text: APFED is an organization dedicated to spreading information about eosinophil-associated diseases. They do everything they can to help those suffering from these conditions and their families, including fund raising, volunteer work, education, research, and advocacy.
features: Help with implementation of the Doctor Finder, an advanced search filtration system to help users find the health care they need
Integration with 3rd party software dedicated to gathering financial support for their cause (SALSA)
Continuing support for the product (front and back end)

name: Eye Consultants of Atlanta
text: Eye Consultants of Atlanta are the leading care providors for LASIK, cataract surgery, glaucoma treatment, and other general eye care in the Atlanta metro area. VisFire worked closely with them to come up with a design that would be optimal for their audience.
features: Continuing support for the product (front and back end)
